name: Skill Level 1 Pack
description:
Pick-Up Sticks

“Pick-Up Sticks” is a favorite game of children and adults alike. Our Nogglers Pick-Up Sticks set contains lots of colored sticks. Each stick has a different point value, with the black stick, or "Emperor Stick," having the highest value. This game teaches hand- eye coordination and patience.
Approximate Size 8"

Trapezoids Triangle

This is a great puzzle for beginning Nogglers! Sitting in the wooden base is a triangle made from variously sized trapezoids. When you put the trapezoids together in the correct pattern, the results will be a wooden triangle that stands three and a quarter inches tall!
Approximate Size 3.25"

Radius Puzzle

It may look easy, but you are really going to have to use your noggin to solve this seemingly simple puzzle. Made from earth- friendly Monkey Pod wood, the “Radius Puzzle” consists of different shapes of wood. When put in the correct position, it will make a perfect cylinder!
Approximate Size 3"

name: Skill Level 2 Pack
description:
Supernova 

“Supernova” is a puzzle that will make you feel dumb. It consists of twelve pieces of wood, each of which forms a precision cut wood block that will fit together perfectly. It can only fit together perfectly if the pieces are arranged in the correct place. The “Supernova” puzzle is one of our top selling puzzles. It makes a great gift for Dads & Grads. To find a store near you that carries the complete line of Nogglers, use the “Store Locator” link at the top of the page.
Approximate Size 2.75"

The Pagoda

In this brain bustin' Nogglers Puzzle, you must carefully arrange the discs in the proper order. Start with all the discs largest to smallest position on the center peg. Now you need to build another Pagoda on an alternate peg by transferring the discs one at a time. You are allowed to use all 3 pegs, but you cannot place a larger piece on top of a smaller piece. It's not as easy as it sounds.
Approximate Size 4.25"

Ancient Key

Can you discover the secret of the Nogglers “Ancient Key?” Along with the 7 finely crafted wood pieces, this Nogglers puzzle includes several wooden dowels and holes to slide them through. Correctly assembled, the parts together make a perfect square, with a space inside for a small treasure! Because of the many small parts the “Ancient Key Nogglers Wooden Puzzle” contains, is not for children under 3 years old.
Approximate Size 2.75"

name: Mini Puzzle Assortment
description:
Mini Puzzle Assortment

Assortments like this are one of the most popular items on our website. Here, 6 of our most popular Skill Level 3 Nogglers have been shrunk down into miniature size. Don't let their size fool you, because they are still as difficult as their larger cousins. This assortment of Nogglers comes in an all- wood box case, and contains mini versions of The Cube, Links, Connection, Lock It Up, Newton’s Comet, and the Serpent Cube.
Set of 6

name: Wine Challenge
description:
Wine Challenge

This clever wooden wine Nogglers puzzle is a great gift for your friends and family on any occasion that might use a bottle of wine. You’ll love to watch their faces as they attempt to unlock the wine you bought them, just be prepared to give them a few hints. The sooner they liberate the bottle, the sooner they’ll share it with you. Enjoy this Nogglers puzzle responsibly!
Approximate Size 6.25"

name: Global Challenge
description: You'll want to keep a cool head with this exciting Nogglers creation we call “Powderkeg.” The object is to take apart the nearly 3 inch tall cylinder and put it back together again. Does it sound simple to you? Well, looks can be deceiving, because it will take a full 40 steps to build and take apart this Skill Level 2 puzzle.
